ext.ojalgo.pride

Class PersistenceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ext.ojalgo.pride.PersistenceProvider

  • public abstract class PersistenceProvider
extends Object

    This class acts as a facade to PriDE. The other classes in this project do NOT access PriDE directly. Everything is accessed through this class.

    • None of the methods here should handle the SQLException exception.
    • Methods that modify the database returns an integer with the number of modified objects.
    • Methods that query the database return an EntityBean or a collection of them.
    Author:
    apete
    See Also:
    Database, SQLException
